content: this crochet beanie hat is made from super bulky yarn top down and then the brim is worked attaching as you go pattern includes instructions for each size individually and is great for beginners 0-6 months 13 5 x 4 5 6-12 months 15 x 5 25 1 - 3 years 16 5 x 6 3-10 years 18 x 6 75 adult 19 5 x 7 5 adult xl 21 x 8 25
